General.Name: Comunication Weaver Co.Ltd
General.Description: Comunication Weaver Co.,Ltd. develops, manufactures, and supplies fiber optic transmission systems to state-owned corporate and financial industries primarily in South Korea. It offers PTN, CWDM/ROADM, MPLS-TP, MSPP, DOTS, and GPON products. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

1.Name: Ki-Hyuk  Sung
1.Title: Chief Exec. Officer, Sr. Managing Director and Director

2.Name: Mr. Daeyoung  Lee
2.Title: Chief Exec. Officer, Pres and Director
